name: Aloo Bharta - Indian Mashed Potatoes
description: Aloo Bharta - Indian Mashed Potatoes. Mashed potatoes with mustard oil, onion, chile, cilantro, salt, pepper and vegan butter. Easy Side. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup finely chopped chopped red onion
1/2 tsp or more roasted ground cumin
1/4 tsp or more cayenne/red chili powder
1/2 tsp or more salt to taste
a few Tbsp chopped cilantro or scallion

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potatoes. Boil, microwave or pressure cook(14 to 16 minutes) until well cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the potatoes. Boil, microwave or pressure cook(14 to 16 minutes) until well cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel if desired and mash well until very smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel if desired and mash well until very smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients and mix in. Add a Tbsp or so water if needed to smooth out the mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients and mix in. Add a Tbsp or so water if needed to smooth out the mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste salt and spice. Serve warm topped with vegan butter or olive oil and black pepper.
